mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FLEAMARKET VALUES ( 0, #{user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sub_location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{max_applicants,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{current_count,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, POST_ID, TITLE, LOCATION, CURRENT_COUNT, REG_DATE, MAX_APPLICANTS, END_DATE, STATE, UUID_FILE_NAME, ORIGIN_FILE_NAME FROM ( SELECT (@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1) AS ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT F.POST_ID, TITLE, SUBSTRING_INDEX(LOCATION, ' ', 3) AS LOCATION, CURRENT_COUNT, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DATE, MAX_APPLICANTS, CASE WHEN STR_TO_DATE(END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') < CURDATE() THEN '모집종료' ELSE '모집중' END AS STATE, END_DATE, FILE2.UUID_FILE_NAME, FILE2.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME FROM FLEAMARKET AS F INNER JOIN ( SELECT FILE1.POST_ID, FILE1.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME, FILE1.UUID_FILE_NAME FROM FLEAMARKET_FILES AS FILE1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT POST_ID, MAX(FILE_ID) AS MAX_FILE_ID FROM FLEAMARKET_FILES GROUP BY POST_ID ) AS MAX_FILE ON FILE1.POST_ID = MAX_FILE.POST_ID AND FILE1.FILE_ID = MAX_FILE.MAX_FILE_ID ) AS FILE2 ON F.POST_ID = FILE2.POST_ID AND CONCAT(F.TITLE,F.LOCATION,F.SUB_LOCATION) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ) AS A, (SELECT @rownum := 0) r ) AS F WHERE F.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{st_rownum,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND #{en_rownum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FLEAMARKET WHERE CONCAT(TITLE,LOCATION,SUB_LOCATION) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
SELECT *, CASE WHEN STR_TO_DATE(END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') < CURDATE() THEN '모집종료' ELSE '모집중' END AS STATE FROM FLEAMARKET WHERE POST_ID = #{post_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE FLEAMARKET SET TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_LOCATION = #{sub_location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAX_APPLICANTS = #{max_applicants,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, END_DATE = date_format(#{end_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d'), UPT_DATE = date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') WHERE POST_ID = #{post_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

ELSE F.TITLE END AS TITLE, SUBSTRING_INDEX(F.LOCATION, ' ', 2) AS LOCATION, F.CURRENT_COUNT, F.MAX_APPLICANTS, A.STATE, CASE WHEN STR_TO_DATE(F.END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') < CURDATE() THEN '모집종료' ELSE '모집중' END AS FSTATE FROM APPLICATION_FM AS A INNER JOIN FLEAMARKET F ON A.POST_ID = F.POST_ID WHERE A.USER_ID = #{user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY POST_ID ) AS T, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) r) AS a where ROWNUM BETWEEN #{st_rownum,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and #{en_rownum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
